title: Moist ginger loaf cake
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons golden syrup', '85g soft brown sugar', '110g margarine', '85g self raising flour', '85g plain flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch salt', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '3 tablespoons milk']
